shortDescription: Simple Daily Habit Tracker helps you build and maintain positive habits with a clean, intuitive interface designed to keep you focused on what matters.
longDescription:
Simple Daily Habit Tracker helps you build and maintain positive habits with a clean, intuitive interface designed to keep you focused on what matters.

Key Features:

  • Track multiple daily habits with ease
  • Visual progress indicators to see your consistency
  • Clean, distraction-free interface
  • Fully offline: no internet connection required, all data stored locally on your device

Perfect for:

  • Anyone looking to build better daily routines
  • People who want a simple, focused habit tracking experience
  • Users who value privacy and offline functionality

Privacy Note: Simple Daily Habit Tracker operates entirely offline and does not collect, transmit, or store any personal data online. All habit data and progress are stored locally on your device. No analytics, tracking, or user data is shared with third parties.
